        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DemandCoreRomeUpgradeHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DemandCoreRomeUpgradeHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DemandCoreRomeUpgradeHelper = Class.create();
DemandCoreRomeUpgradeHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	updateReferenceQualifierOnDemand: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(fieldName == 'department'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') == "javascript: current.business_unit ? 'business_unit=' + current.business_unit : ''"){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', 'javascript: global.DemandMgmtDataSeparationUtil.getActiveDepartmentIdsForDemand(current);');
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
				else if(fieldName == 'business_unit'){
					if(!gr.getValue('reference_qual')){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', 'javascript: global.DemandMgmtDataSeparationUtil.getActiveBusinessUnitIdsForDemand(current);');
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on demand table doesn not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating reference qualifier on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}		
	},
	updateDefaultValueOnDemand: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(!gr.getValue('default_value')){
					if(fieldName == 'business_unit'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', 'javascript: global.DemandMgmtDataSeparationUtil.getDefaultBusinessUnitIdForDemand(current);');
					}
					else if(fieldName == 'department'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', 'javascript: global.DemandMgmtDataSeparationUtil.getDefaultDepartmentIdForDemand(current);');
					}
					gr.update();
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been updated');
				}
				else {
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on demand table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on demand table doesn not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating default value on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}
	},
    type: 'DemandCoreRomeUpgradeHelper'
};]]></script>
